title: Thick And Non-Toxic. The Perfect Yoga Mat For Your Digital Life In Balance
author: Rachel
description: Digital Dementia Memory Enhancer. Experts recommend less notifications, more balance, meditation and more interaction with the real world. To the mind, exercising The Art and Physicality and Focus of a Yoga practice is a terrific anti-dote to tech related memory stealers that can cause Digital Dementia.
